Our focus is on customer satisfaction, and receiving positive reviews is important to us - we have the best score among French energy suppliers on Google Reviews and Trust Pilot. Client-side, we use React, Redux and SASS; our mobile apps are built using native code or React Native. Across Octopus, we're looking for genuinely decent people who are honest and empathetic.
